void CGpiTransferDlg::OnBnClickedFind (  )  [protected]

Click handler for Find (file to send) button. //!

Displays a File..Open dialog allowing the user to select the file to send.

Definition at line 122 of file CGpiTransferDlg.cpp.

void CGpiTransferDlg::OnBnClickedOk (  )  [protected]

Click handler for OK button. //!

Initiates the file transfer process. Actual packets are //! sent by the mCom itself, but the file entered is checked before //! sending the message. If the file exists, a GPI File Progress //! dialog box will appear that will not let the user continue until the file transfer completes or the user cancels it. If //! the file doesn't exist, an error dialog will appear.

References FmiApplicationLayer::mClientCodepage, mCom, mGpiFilePath, minval, mVersion, FmiApplicationLayer::sendGpiFile(), TRUE, and UTIL_hex_to_uint8().

void CGpiTransferDlg::OnEnChangeGpiFile (  )  [protected]

Edit Change handler for all text boxes. //!

Enables the OK button if both a file name and mVersion are //! specified, and the mVersion is of the appropriate length

BOOL CGpiTransferDlg::OnInitDialog (  )  [protected]

Initialize the dialog //!

This function is called when the window is created. It //! sets up the parent, so it can get info from and send a message //! to FmiApplicationLayer. //!

Returns:
TRUE, since this function does not set focus to a control
